about.title: OUR STORY
about.subtitle: Discover the story and vision of Hackboot, Estonian leader in next-generation cloud gaming

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Hackboot is an innovative technology company specialized in high-performance cloud gaming solutions.
overview.vmcloudDesc: We are part of the VMCloud Group, a leader in enterprise cloud solutions and innovative technologies.
overview.establishedDesc: Founded in Estonia with a clear vision: revolutionize the gaming industry through the cloud.
overview.mission: We build premium gaming experiences with uncompromising security.
overview.vision: A trusted ecosystem for competitive players and creators.

stats.title: Our numbers speak

timeline.title: Our journey
timeline.subtitle: From game keys to cloud gaming leader

event1.title: Hackboot Creation
event1.description: Launch of the company with game key sales. First customer base in the gaming market, establishing our reputation.

event2.title: Strategic Pivot
event2.description: Transition to custom software development in the gaming field. Deep technical expertise and continuous innovation.

event3.title: Cloud Gaming Revolution
event3.description: Launch of our cloud gaming platform with focus on professional tools. Immediate success and exponential growth.

event4.title: VMCloud Expansion
event4.description: Integration into VMCloud Group and expansion of generalized cloud services. New era of growth and innovation.

faq.title: Got questions?
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to the most common questions

questions.question: Is Hackboot legal?
questions.answer: Yes, Hackboot operates under Estonian jurisdiction where the development and use of game modifications are entirely legal. We strictly comply with all applicable laws and are a registered and licensed company in Estonia (VMCloud Group O√ú).

questions.question: What games are supported?
questions.answer: We support over 10 popular games including Valorant, Apex Legends, Overwatch 2, Fortnite, Call of Duty Warzone, CS2, Rainbow Six Siege, PUBG, and Rust. New titles are added regularly.

questions.question: How does security work?
questions.answer: We use multi-layer kernel-level protection with integrated HWID spoofer. Our technology is undetectable with 0% detection on all platforms. E2E encryption and 24/7 monitoring to guarantee your security.

questions.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time without hidden fees or commitments. Your access remains active until the end of the paid period.

questions.question: What hardware is required?
questions.answer: No specific hardware required! Hackboot runs entirely in the cloud. You just need a stable internet connection (minimum 10 Mbps) and a modern browser.

questions.question: How does customer support work?
questions.answer: Our support is available 24/7 via Discord, email, and WhatsApp. Average response time under 5 minutes. For premium customers, a dedicated account manager is available.

questions.question: Is there a trial period?
questions.answer: We offer different plans suited to all needs. You can start with our Essential Pack from ‚Ç¨27.90/month to test our services before upgrading to a higher plan.

questions.question: What performance can I expect?
questions.answer: Our servers equipped with RTX 4090 and i9-13900K offer exceptional performance: 240+ FPS at 1080p, <5ms latency, and 99.9% guaranteed uptime. Performance varies according to your chosen plan.

finalCTA.title: Join the gaming elite
finalCTA.subtitle: Start your Hackboot adventure today. Maximum performance, total security, 24/7 support.

careers.title: Let's build the future of gaming together
careers.subtitle: Join a passionate team pushing the boundaries of cloud gaming. Work on innovative projects with cutting-edge technologies.

cloud-engineer.title: Cloud Engineer
cloud-engineer.shortDescription: Design and manage our cloud infrastructure to ensure performance and scalability.
cloud-engineer.description: Join our technical team to build and maintain a robust and scalable cloud infrastructure.
responsibilities: Design and deploy cloud architectures (AWS, GCP, Azure)
Ensure high availability and service resilience
Collaborate with dev teams for continuous integration
requirements: 3+ years of experience in cloud architecture
Mastery of at least one major cloud platform
Knowledge of Terraform, CloudFormation or Pulumi

frontend-backend-developer.title: Front-end / Back-end Developer
frontend-backend-developer.shortDescription: Develop modern web applications with React, Next.js and Node.js.
frontend-backend-developer.description: We are looking for a versatile developer to work on our entire platform stack.
requirements: Passion for clean code and best practices

network-specialist.title: Network Specialist
network-specialist.shortDescription: Ensure the performance and security of our global network infrastructure.
network-specialist.description: Join our team to manage and optimize our worldwide network infrastructure.
responsibilities: Implement CDN and load balancing solutions
Manage network security (firewalls, VPN, DDoS protection)
requirements: Mastery of TCP/IP, DNS, BGP protocols
Experience with CDN and load balancers

security-expert.title: Security Expert
security-expert.shortDescription: Protect our infrastructure and users against cyber threats.
security-expert.description: We are looking for a security expert to strengthen our platform and user protection.
responsibilities: Train teams on security best practices
requirements: Mastery of security tools (SIEM, WAF, IDS/IPS)
Experience in pentesting and vulnerability assessment
Knowledge of OWASP Top 10, SANS Top 25

game-acquisition-manager.title: Game Acquisition Manager
game-acquisition-manager.shortDescription: Identify and acquire the best games for our cloud gaming platform.
game-acquisition-manager.description: Join our content team to enrich our catalog with the most exciting games on the market.
responsibilities: Identify and evaluate game acquisition opportunities
Negotiate contracts with developers and publishers
requirements: 3+ years of experience in the video game industry
Established network in the gaming industry
Deep knowledge of the video game market
Passion for games and new trends

partnership-manager.title: Partnership Manager
partnership-manager.shortDescription: Develop strategic partnerships to accelerate our growth.
partnership-manager.description: We are looking for a partnership manager to develop our ecosystem and strategic collaborations.
responsibilities: Collaborate with product and marketing teams
requirements: Experience in tech or gaming appreciated

content-curator.title: Content Curator
content-curator.shortDescription: Create and manage engaging content for our gamer community.
content-curator.description: Join our content team to create engaging experiences and quality content for our users.
responsibilities: Organize games into categories and collections
Collaborate with marketing and community teams
requirements: 2+ years of content curation or gaming writing experience
Excellent knowledge of the gaming universe
benefits: Play and discover games in preview

digital-marketing-specialist.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
digital-marketing-specialist.shortDescription: Develop our marketing campaigns to acquire and engage new users.
digital-marketing-specialist.description: We are looking for a digital marketing specialist to boost our growth and awareness.
responsibilities: Create and manage multi-channel marketing campaigns
Manage paid ads campaigns (Google, Meta, TikTok)
Collaborate with content and product teams
requirements: Mastery of Google Ads, Meta Ads
Experience in tech or gaming appreciated

public-relations-manager.title: Public Relations Manager
public-relations-manager.shortDescription: Develop our brand image and manage our relationships with media and influencers.
public-relations-manager.description: Join our team to manage our reputation and develop our media presence in the gaming industry.
responsibilities: Collaborate with influencers and content creators

market-analyst.title: Market Analyst
market-analyst.shortDescription: Analyze market trends to guide our business and product strategy.
market-analyst.description: We are looking for a market analyst to help us understand the gaming market and guide our strategic decisions.
responsibilities: Conduct market research and competitive benchmarks
Collaborate with product and business teams
requirements: Mastery of Excel, BI tools (Tableau, Power BI)

technical-support-agent.title: Technical Support Agent
technical-support-agent.shortDescription: Help our users resolve technical issues and fully enjoy our platform.
technical-support-agent.description: Join our support team to provide exceptional customer experience to our gamers.
responsibilities: Escalate complex issues to tech teams

community-moderator.title: Community Moderator
community-moderator.shortDescription: Animate and moderate our gamer community to create a positive and engaging environment.
community-moderator.description: We are looking for a passionate moderator to manage our community and create a welcoming space for everyone.
responsibilities: Moderate discussions on Discord, forums, social media
Animate the community with events and challenges
requirements: 1+ year of moderation or community management experience
Knowledge of Discord and social media
benefits: At the heart of the gaming community
